# <a name="print-an-attachment"></a><span data-ttu-id="b27b6-102">Štampanje priloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b27b6-102">Print an attachment</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="b27b6-103">Otvorite poruku koja sadrži prilog koji želite da odštampate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b27b6-103">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="b27b6-104">Premestite kursor preko prilog i izaberite ikonu **više radnji**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b27b6-104">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **More actions** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="b27b6-105">> Da **biste preuzeli**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b27b6-105">> **Download**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="b27b6-106">Nakon što je datoteka je preuzeta, otvori ga uz odgovarajući program i odaberite opciju za štampanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b27b6-106">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b27b6-107">Na primer, otvorite .doc datoteku u programu Word, a zatim odštampajte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b27b6-107">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b27b6-108">Za više informacija, pročitajte [Štampanje e-poruke, prilozi, i kalendari u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b27b6-108">For more information, read [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
